label: Jaiswal, Neeshma, S. K. Upadhyay, Anshu Malhotra, Charles K. Blend, Norman O. Dronen & Sandeep K. Malhotra.  2014. A new species of Neolebouria Gibson, 1976 (Opecoelidae: Plagioporinae) from the whitecheek monocle bream, Scolopsis vosmeri (Perciformes: Nemipteridae), from the Panjim coast at Goa, with a checklist of parasites previously reported from this fish.
